Name: Chromo XY
About the game: Working alongside your colleague 'Rebecca' has always been a bit of a trial, as she just can't quit trying to push the boundaries of modern science. You have even begun to wonder if she is a scientist at all, or instead more of a mythical alchemist! Now your friendship and your life will be put to the test when you try her latest drug. One that incidentally turns you into a woman... Complete with all the aspects that entails. Now you will have to truly walk a mile in another persons shoes, as well as their bras and panties too... In this game you have your best friend Greg to help you and Rebecca searching for a cure. Though who knows which of these two will help you get through this or simply wish to... Ahem! study you closer. A Visual Novel Game with Multiple Choices Multiple different endings based on your decisions Adult content and sex scenes to explore Fun comedic moments to enjoy Your decisions determine the events and story * All characters included in the game are over the age of 18.
